basic_info.description: I'm a dedicated frontend developer with expertise in Python, JavaScript, and ReactJS. Pursuing a Master's in Information Systems at the University of Utah, I'm driven by a passion for the latest web frameworks. Outside coding, I find joy in nature photography and indulge in competitive gaming with League of Legends. I thrive on blending technical innovation with creative pursuits.

projects.title: Suburban Outfitters
projects.description: Developed a dynamic online shopping and ecommerce platform for Suburban Outfitters, enhancing user convenience, personalized experiences, real-time order tracking, and inventory management. Leveraged React, HTML, CSS, PHP, and MySQL to create a seamless shopping experience for customers.

projects.title: Security Automation Tool
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive web application for security automation, integrating REST APIs for firewall policy configuration and leveraging MongoDB for back-end service construction. Achieved a remarkable 40% increase in operational efficiency while securely integrating with major SaaS tools like O365, GSuite, Box, and Salesforce.

projects.title: Face Mask Detection System
projects.description: Spearheaded the creation of a sophisticated face mask detection system using deep learning and computer vision techniques. Integrated it into a web platform using the Django framework to ensure compliance with COVID-19 protocols, resulting in accurate mask detection and streamlined enforcement measures.
